content: this cozy winter headband is a crocheter s dream made with bulky weight yarn this squishy and warm headband will fly off your hook the headband comes in two sizes and can be made in half an hour for experienced crocheters if you enjoy quick and rewarding projects then you will love this pattern the pattern also includes a video tutorial to guide you through the entire project **materials ** size i-9 5 5 mm crochet hook 1/2 skein of knit picks brava bulky weight yarn scissors yarn/tapestry needle removable stitch marker **sizes ** s/m m/l s/m head circumference 18 20 inches m/l head circumference 21-23 inches **skill level ** advanced beginner
